short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Poshmark auto sharing bot/Crosslister tool for the poshmark seller.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Poshmark Automation (Poshmark Bot) & Cross Listing. Closet Assistant offers the most features at the most affordable cost on the market. We offer a series of automated tools for the Poshmark Seller & Resellers. 

The Closet Assistant is built by Resellers for Resellers!

All features were built to function in a manner you would manually preform except Closet Assistant will now take the workload off your shoulders and allow you to spend more time doing what you love!

Available in The United States & Canada 

Cross Listing Supported Marketplaces:
•	Poshmark
•	eBay
•	Facebook Marketplace
•	Depop
•	Kidizen
•	Etsy
•	Vinted
•	Grailed
 
Poshmark Automation Bot Features: 

•	Share Your Closet
•	Share Other Users Closet
•	Share to Parties
•	Share Feed Pages, Brand Pages, and Categories Pages. 
•	Send Offers Automatically 
•	Closet Organizer
•	Auto Follow Users
•	Edit Share Listings
•	Relist/Delete Listings
•	Sales Map
•	Bulk Price Reducer/Increaser
•	Auto Pilot (Task Scheduler)
•	Sales Manager
•	Closet Revenue Estimator
•	Auto Comment
•	Captcha Alert & Solving
•	Return shares and follows from your News Feed!
              And More!

With our Poshmark bot & Crosslisting you will no longer need to spend countless hours a day sharing and listing items. Spend more time where it counts in your Reselling business! 

You can now use Closet Assistant remotely from your desktop on your tablet or mobile device.

Closet Assistant offers a FREE 7- Day Trial, Once you use the Closet Assistant you’ll understand why we are the fastest growing tool for the Poshmark seller. 

Gain a competitive edge with Closet Assistant! 


Visit our website at :  www.closetassistantpm.com
Visit our blog: www.closetassistantpm.com/blog/
